caption:
Simon and Brooke King answered the call to Carlsbad, NM—a city of 32,000 with very little rain and winds so strong they close highways and schools. Despite the challenges, the Kings have embraced their mission with grace and passion. Now pastoring Carlsbad Apostolic Church this beautiful couple and their three boys are faithfully serving the people God has placed in their care.

They love God deeply, work tirelessly, and are committed to helping others know Jesus. We’ve had a wonderful time here facilitating a marriage retreat and Family Sunday, and I am so impressed with this amazing family. I thank God for their dedication.  https://carlsbadapostolicchurch.com/
